abstract: Trial begins for Charlotte Police Officer Randall Kerrick, who fatally shot 24-year-old black man Jonathan Ferrell in 2013 while he was searching for help after car accident; Kerrick faces voluntary manslaughter charges.
lead_paragraph: The fatal shooting of Jonathan Ferrell in September 2013 occurred amid the beginning of the national debate over the deaths of young black men that followed the killing of Trayvon Martin in 2012.

headline.main: Trial Opens for Charlotte Officer Who Fatally Shot Black Motorist Seeking Help
